knimeNode.name: Table to String
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts the given input table to a base 64 encoded string.

intro.p: Converts the given input table to a base 64 encoded string. Used to allow the transfer of a KNIME table across web services, allowing reconstruction using the String to Table node.

ports.inPort: The table to convert to a string.
ports.outPort: The base 64 encoded string representation of the table.
